author: James Joyce
text: Dear Mr Grant Richards Letters sent to me at above (not the old) address will find me promptly. My friend Mr Ezra Pound will send you the fourth, fifth and third chapters of my novel so as to save time. You wrote to me in July to say that you would send me the press notices of Dubliners. If you have double copies you could send them now. I shall send them back to you from above address in a week or so. Any letter or packet sent me should be addressed as above Sincerely yours James Joyce
